Summary: NL in rural IL moved across sky, halted, changed c
divs: Sighting DetailsA woman was driving her daughter to school when she observed Jupiter in the west(familiar to her), plus a second light of similar brightness near the planet.Momentarily, the light moved N to S at high speed, halting in the SW. Over thenext several minutes, it changed from white to orange to pink-orange, then fadedout.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Sherrard
There were no other sightings in Sherrard on or around October 21st 1999
